response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire our premium product. We believe it would greatly benefit your endeavors and enhance your business significantly. Considering its value and the benefits it offers, we are extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, we are willing to sell the product to you at a special price of $950,000. This is an exceptional opportunity given the product's true worth of $1,200,000. Please let us know if you are interested in discussing this further.", "product_price": 950000}
